website_summaries.verdict: Many people love these sandals for their style and comfort.
pros: Cork footbed provides proper foot, heel, and arch support
Comes in a variety of colors
cons: Mephisto says this style runs small and advises ordering a full size up

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto was recommended to me by an orthopedic doctor when I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto is the only shoe I wear. I have about 20 pairs. Mephisto was recommended to me by an orthopedic doctor when I was having trouble walking without pain. No pain now! They have a great foot bed & arch support. I usually buy 2 pair each year. Some for every day & others for dressy. The best part when they start looking grimy or worn you can send them in to be refurbished at a nominal price. Mephisto even pays shipping. I love them!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes-but break them in first...
customer_reviews.text: I am a long time fan of Mephisto shoes but have found that they DO need to be broken in as it were.(i.e. if you just put them on brand new and head out for long walking day etc they are going to ultimately hurt here and there) Just wear them around the house and/or for short walks until they feel right-that has worked for me every time. (I also suggest softening the nubuck with an appropriate leather cleaner too) Overall very happy with my new purchase though (and their shoes-if taken care of-last a LONG time...i am still wearing a comfy pair that i got over 7 years ago!)
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE - WELL CONSTRUCTED - DURABLE
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed, comfortable, received compliments. I have owned this same shoe in the past (black) and wore them every day, all day for three years. Comfortable until the end. I finally had to toss them when the cork broke in half. I worked in them, walked in them, gardened in them, etc. and loved them. I just received this pair and will be in the market for another (brown or black). I had a different pair of Mephisto (black patent leather with rhinestone buckles) that I loved, but I wore those to death also. Those were my absolute favorite, but they are no longer manufactured. Mephisto, I love you!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Isabel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE my Mephisto's. I bought a pair 20 years ago. They have been sent back in to be resoled. Yep, they will that for $75 dollars, postage pairs. You really get your money's worth out of them. I wear a 10wide and with the adjustable straps they fit great. Did I say I LOVE ❤️ them❓ YES I DO🤗❣️🤣
customer_reviews.author: Julli Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. I love that both straps are adjustable.
customer_reviews.text: I'm usually a 6.5 in women's sandals and I ordered a 36 in these and it was perfect sizing for me. Very comfortable! First day or two of wear the strap was irritating my big toe, but nothing major (no blisters). After a few days, it's been total comfort. I like that there are two adjustable straps - my feel usually swell in hot weather so with these, I can just adjust the straps! Design also looks nice and the silver color I got goes with all of my outfits.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lin

customer_reviews.title: BEST sandal by Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Mephisto sandal, out of the box, comfort day 1; can't say that about some other Mephisto sandals. Stock up should they discontinue. This is by far my most comfortable sandal and black goes with everything. Too bad they no longer sell and are discontinuing the silver Vernise or the Grey Etna. I can't say I recommend the ones with the hard leather (not as comfortable) but the suede is great.
customer_reviews.author: gmajja

customer_reviews.title: Black Hannel Sandal means Black Bare Feet!
customer_reviews.text: The dye comes off every time I wear them. (Up front I learned that is not a default.) The nu-buck leather is not as soft as previous shoes, so it's taking a long time to break them in. The sole, at first, felt like comfortable slippers, but they're not there yet. I look forward to breaking them in enough, and having the dye stop staining my feet, so that I can enjoy them the way I should!
customer_reviews.author: Crone Butterfly

customer_reviews.title: Shoes and box not new quality
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were fine, but definitely showed signs of having been worn a bit on the interior. Odd smell too... The real issue is Amazon threw the shoebox in a bag to ship. Shoe box was dented, and not new quality. Not happy ....
customer_reviews.author: Katherine F

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!  Very disappointed in my latest purchase of the Copacabana/Camel Waxy
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Mephisto's Hannel sandals since 2007, I have flat feet and was touring Italy for 1 month...I walked all over the country and never had leg or foot pain, nor did my legs feel tired. ...I buy a new pair every 2 years because I wear them in the house also. Thank you Amazon for having a terrific selection! I just purchased the Copacabana/Camel waxy and they are NOT all leather. The upper strap portion of the printed design is a vinyl glued to fabric. I can’t believe it! Called customer service and the lady said they must have put the wrong item in the box! I’m sending them back.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals from Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: The color is just perfect for wearing with pretty much anything, including white. I was a little worried about the patent leather, but it actually dresses the sandal up just enough that it looks fine with summer skirts, as well as shorts or pants. Looks great with white jeans, somewhat surprisingly. And, as with all Mephistos - or at least the vast majority of them - these are going to be super comfortable and easy to walk in. Note, I'm a true 5.5 in all brands of shoes, from inexpensive to high end, but I wear a size 5 in Mephistos, and they always fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Aungrl

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Have had several pairs because they take such great care of my sensitive feet. Wish I could find more of the colors I like.
customer_reviews.author: AReal Person, the

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE these sandals
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy and wide feet. I have 4 pairs of these and they are the only shoes I can stand without pain pills because the leathers are very smooth and the straps avoid my bunion surgeries. When it gets cold and I have to wear socks/shoes the uneven textures of socks and pressure from the shoes make it almost impossible to walk. Anyway, LOVE LOVE these sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Retired

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandal for High Arches
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. Bought a pair 6 years ago and they are so comfortable. I have very high arches and these are one of the few brands of sandals that I can wear. But after 6 years, the cork in my 6 year olf pair was breaking and I needed to replace them. Would have prefered Light Beige Nubuck in stead of brown, but it was not available in my size. The brown is OK, but would have liked the lighter color. I hope mephisto keeps making this shoe. If the light Beige Nubuck becomes available, I will definately buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: LoweFamily

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sandals--well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: I love my Mephisto's. Having problem feet for most of my life, it is good to find a product that is well made, durable, and comfortable. NOT MADE IN CHINA. I buy these year after year, as they eventually wear out as I am an avid walker. The foot bed is well contoured. They are comfortable from day one. While a lot of products out there are cheaper, they are cheaper for a reason. I have these in several colors and will continue to buy them.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Really like the fit of Mephisto Handel Sandel. It is my second pair and will buy more. Wish Mephisto would make the Patton leather black again (got the black leather...is ok...not as attractive as the Patton leather). I will buy this sandal again when it's comes out in leather I like.
customer_reviews.author: JKS

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nice but strap comes too high and angled across the foot and not comfortable at all. Mephisto missed the mark on this style. The color was very nice and was the color I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mamashoppa

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto = AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: They definitely look prettier in the picture than in person. They are super comfortable and I have come to the conclusion that most truly comfortable shoes are not going to be pretty like their designer counterparts. Some are just as expensive though! I', happy with these and I love Mephisto as well as MBT. My feet are happy too!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: superb fit
customer_reviews.text: My third pair of Mephisto sandals!!! Says for me they are the most comfortable sandals ever!!
customer_reviews.author: CA Ridings

customer_reviews.title: Been purchasing these for years!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase a new pair of these just about yearly, as I wear them often because they are the most comfortable shoe I own. I wear them in winter even, with a wool sock if not too snowy out (or slippery, because they have no tread!)
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: huge sores
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased Mephisto shoes before and absolutely love them. When I put these on they fit like a glove. i was so happy. 2 days later I have broken skin in various places on both feet...not too happy. These are also very heavy. If you do a lot of walking I would not recommend because the little bones and muscles in your feet are doing a lot of work lifting these each step.
customer_reviews.author: julieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I love your shoes They fit well I already had them ...
customer_reviews.text: I love your shoes They fit well I already had them on about about 7 times after I got them in the mail Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Laura Duritza

customer_reviews.title: This sandal is comfortable but my feet turn black from the dye every ...
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is comfortable but my feet turn black from the dye every time I wear them. I thought it would resolve itself after wearing them for awhile but it never has. I would not get them again since my feet always look dirty after I wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Just so sandal
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is a nice sandal that looks good and fits well, at first. Unfortunately for me, they stretched and caused calluses on areas that I never expected friction to occur. I will return to another Brands sandals
customer_reviews.author: BB

customer_reviews.title: Immediately Loved These Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I already knew my size, and thankfully there are some things that stay the same. I hope the quality stays as good for the future, because I wear these everywhere. I had Morton's Neuroma so I am careful what I put on my feet for walking. I am extremely pleased. The shoes are expensive, but my old ones are in their fourth year and although a bit loose, I am still wearing them around the house for support. Very nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Aunt Cherrie B

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of Mephisto sandals and I live in them. They are my 'indoor shoes' and last for years (my last pair is still wearable after 8 years although the cork sole has separated a bit from the footbed). Mephisto sandals are more comfortable than the orthotics in my track shoes. And this new grey color is going to be far more practical than my previous light pink pair. They are expensive for sandals but this style with its adjustable straps, arch support and durability make them a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: CaryMom

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever!
customer_reviews.text: My cranio-osteopath recommended Mephistos and this is the fourth pair I have purchased. I live in them in the summer. I have high arches and they provide great support!
customer_reviews.author: cam

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: So thrilled I could get these sandals. Have had many pair and wear them out. Love the grey color, like a taupe that goes with everything. Super comfy. Best thing I got on Mothers Day, super fast delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Deb Golonka

customer_reviews.title: but my back is happy and they are a lot more attractive than so ...
customer_reviews.text: Would give them 5 stars if they weren't SO expensive, but my back is happy and they are a lot more attractive than so many "comfort" shoes out there. Definitely would not have spent that kind of cash without assurance that they would fit, but I just ordered the same size and similar style to a pair I already own and they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.Elliott

customer_reviews.title: poor fit
customer_reviews.text: Been wearing Mephistos for 10 years. This sandal does not fit like older models. Very disappointed--wish i could return. I use Mephisto sandals because they support my spine and I can walk in them all day without pain. But not this one.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: Cute comfortable Sandel.
customer_reviews.text: I received very promptly and in good new unused condition. very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Heim

customer_reviews.title: DIDN'T WORK FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: ARCH SUPPORT IS WRONG. T THEY CAUSED BACK PAIN & FOOT PAIN. I ONCE HAD A PAIR OF THESE & WORE WITHOUT A PROBLEM. EITHER THYE'VE CHANGED OR I HAVE. JUST NOT A COMFORTABLE SHOE.
customer_reviews.author: Quality Rules

customer_reviews.title: In every color
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best shoes I have ever worn, so comfortable I can walk forever in it. I have had two pair already, this is the third. Mephisto has some magical way of cushioning your foot without blistering or constraining. In hot and humid climates, this shoe lets your foot breathe while providing excellent support.
customer_reviews.author: P. McGraw

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sandles!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of hannels. My first pair lasted 5 years and I wore them almost every day in the spring, summer and fall. They are fantastic sandles and your feet feel great no matter how much walking you do.
customer_reviews.author: myra hatfield

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Happy
customer_reviews.text: As with any new shoe I wear them for a few hours until I adjust to them. Very happy with the sandal was unable to purchase in a store as now fall is around the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Marti Peters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love how they fit, very comfortable. Don't like how quickly the leather fades and looks worn out.
customer_reviews.author: i

customer_reviews.title: Expected better from Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: The sole is comfortable. However the leather is a bit stiff and hard and rubs against my foot. Not the best Mephisto sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Second pair of this exact shoe, great value for the price since they last forever
customer_reviews.author: M. Reslock

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Hannel
customer_reviews.text: Although it's been too cold here to actually wear these, I have worn them a few hours around the house. They seem comfortable. I am normally a size 11. I ordered up a size in these. From my experiences with sandals with the raised edges, you need to size up to accommodate for the 'lost' space. The arch support seems adequate.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miller

customer_reviews.title: “Navy” not navy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this shoe for a couple years & found very comfortable, I reordered same style in black, grey & navy. The navy is lighter, grey-blue even though Mephisto calls it navy.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Bisgrove

customer_reviews.title: finally getting to flex [the leather straps] and feel comfortable. should have bought a size larger but these ...
customer_reviews.text: finally getting to flex [the leather straps] and feel comfortable. should have bought a size larger but these are barely my size. I have always like the brand.
customer_reviews.author: mj messing

customer_reviews.title: All in all they are good
customer_reviews.text: Would like a little narrower shoe because I have a very narrow foot. The arch could be just a little higher but not much
customer_reviews.author: SkyKing

customer_reviews.title: Too wide
customer_reviews.text: Too wide, was unable to get the strap narrow enough. I have a pair I have had for several years, was able to get them narrow enough. I was disappointed, usually love the Memphisto shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strap over instep does not enable me to walk normally. I have high insteps.
customer_reviews.author: Katy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THIS SANDAL!!
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic foot problems including plantar faciitis, tendonitis, etc. I can not wear most sandals. This Mephisto women's Hannel sandal is one that works for me. It has arch support, is comfortable, and is stylish as well. It comes in many colors. My favorite is black. The only thing I would change about it is the color of the footbed. I would prefer a black footbed with black sandals instead of gray. But, this is a small concession when evaluating the shoe's comfort, support, and versatility. I recommend this sandal to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my new sandals
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable & stylish, as far as comfy flat sandals go. Fit is fine - I usually wear size 6.5 and got size 37 Mephisto sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Mary L

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto sandals
customer_reviews.text: I love these sandals. This is the fifth pair I have purchased. Three were purchased from Amazon.com. I wear them daily. They are the most comfortable shoes I own. I ordered the sandals on Friday and received them on Sunday. Excellent shopping experience.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Gabris

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for tired feet.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn this style of Mephisto sandals for over 20 years. They are the most comfortable shoes I’ve ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E Buffaloe

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Last pair lasted at least 15 years. Have fasciitis in both feet so Mephistos are on the top of my list for comfort and to prevent pain.
customer_reviews.author: K. E. Eisenhart

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are pretty, but not as comfortable as my other Myphiscos
customer_reviews.text: Strap not comfortable across the back of big toe. Would not buy another pair in this style.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Healy

customer_reviews.title: Best Shoe for a High Arch
customer_reviews.text: I'm not able to normally wear a sandal without a strap on the back, but these stay on so well you'll never notice. I started wearing Mephisto's because I have a high arch and it would really hurt my feet to walk a long ways in my Teva's. These shoes have saved my feet. I own five pairs. They are pricy by some people's standards (flipflop wearers!), but if you have foot issues and aren't a fan of Birkenstock. Then Mephisto's are for you. Highly recommend them!!! The price online is just as good as I've gotten any where else. Jan H.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Hussey

customer_reviews.title: Best Sandel Ever
customer_reviews.text: After 4 years I wore out a pair of these sandals and bought this pair to replace them. They are awesome. One of the best features is the double adjustable buckles, very important to someone with a slender foot. The arch support is just right. I am so glad I was able to find an exact replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn N

customer_reviews.title: I can go all day in this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd pair of Hannel's I've purchased. I have a high arch and a heel spur that flares at times and these shoes are the most comfortable I have ever owned. This particular pair required a break-in period of couple of days that I didn't expect, but they were just perfect after that.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L Eliassen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. Comfortable. Super cute due to the patent leather. Not at all butch looking like the Birkenstocks of years ago. Not that there's anything wrong with that! I just like cute, quasi-girly things.
customer_reviews.author: cleedenver

customer_reviews.title: Best style
customer_reviews.text: I love this style - it is the most comfortabe Mephisto I own. I already had one pr of this style & was hoping to find another (not necessarily this color) . I wish Mephisto would make more Hannels. Your service is "the greatist" as usual.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Thoman

customer_reviews.title: Love This Brand of Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I own 10 pairs of Mephistos sandals, love the fit, comfort, support
customer_reviews.author: LULU

customer_reviews.title: I can take these out of the box  and...
customer_reviews.text: wear them right away! Love this style. My neighbor says they are too frumpy for her, but she doesn't have feet issues like me, flat feet and side bunions. Please make them go on sale more often.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sandals
customer_reviews.text: The Mephisto sandal is great.....and look good. I have severe bunions and the straps are perfect to get a good fit and the location of the strap is comfortable on the bunions too. I wear bamboo socks, so there was no breaking the sandals in...... This company deliverd promptly ..... less than a week to my APO....... Thank you. I wish you had the beige color that I wanted too. I ordered the beige Maphistos at the same time from a different company and I am still waiting to receive them.....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon buyer

customer_reviews.title: only shoes I wear
customer_reviews.text: if you have planter fasciitis you might want to give these a try I can wear them day in and day out with no pain
customer_reviews.author: angel 4

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and love the soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and love the soft leather. Took some getting used to the stiffer, heavier sole that comes with cork sole.
customer_reviews.author: 4u2c

customer_reviews.title: ... goes I have been wearing Mephisto's for years and love them. They are very comfortable and offer excellent ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing with this goes I have been wearing Mephisto's for years and love them. They are very comfortable and offer excellent support; I can walk miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: My favorite shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 8th pair of Mephistos. My 3rd pair of Hannels!. They are the most comfortable sandals. The footbed gives great support. I have a high arch and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Allred

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Mephisto sandals. They fit so well with good arch support. I have long narrow feet and fit it just right.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pair of sandals to replace a favorite pair of sandals that is no longer made. I chose the black patent so that I can either dress them up or down depending upon the occasion. I find the look and fit to be good.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Good sandals.
customer_reviews.text: I have several pairs of this sandal in different colors. Very good arch support which is why I buy them. Wish they had the cork part covered though to make it dressier and also wish it came in navy.
customer_reviews.author: cec

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoe. Fits perfectly and my feet are so happy
customer_reviews.author: Myriam Tutoy

customer_reviews.title: These sandals are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Mephistos give great support to my feet. I especially love the style of the Hannel because I can add holes to the straps to fit my narrow feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes! They ease my foot pain from plantar ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic shoes! They ease my foot pain from plantar fasciitis. I wear them constantly around the house for arch support and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Homewithkids

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals ever
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals ever! I have a long, wide foot and these fit as though they were made especially for my feet!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sandal. Provides good arch support, so my wife does not have pain in her heels.
customer_reviews.author: Winston D. Ling

customer_reviews.title: They have excellent arch and importantly heel-hugging support
customer_reviews.text: Once I wore them in (2 of the straps rubbed a bit at the start), I could live in them. They have excellent arch and importantly heel-hugging support, entirely eliminating lower back pain from walking for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Watt

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Very Comfortable! They have really good arch support and I would highly recommend a pair!
customer_reviews.author: Therese Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Annual Shoe Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This shoe gets bought by me once a year...it fits great, supports my feet and is my " go to" pair. I cannot even guess how many I have owned. They never fail to be consistently at the front of my closet, ready to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Lorene Noe

customer_reviews.title: Even though the price seems expensive....I wear my sandals every day and they last me at least a year!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these sandals! They fit my feet perfectly! They support my arch and are very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Debra M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for problem feet!
customer_reviews.text: Love the support of Mephisto sandals. Great arch support. This is my fifth pair of this sandal. As I have narrow feet, the buckles are a must.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Lifetime Choice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoes that never give me a problem. Fit is consistent, quality good and they last forever. Simple timeless style works with everything.
customer_reviews.author: CarolSchrillo

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. This is my second pair that I have ordered and love the second pair every bit as much as the first pair!
customer_reviews.author: 2paddlers

customer_reviews.title: my favorite shoes
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto's are my favorite sandals. I actually own the Hannels in two colors now. I do research prices because these sandals are expensive and Amazon has the best deal and I am never sorry when I order from this website.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha A. Collins

customer_reviews.title: MEPHISTO SANDAL
customer_reviews.text: THE QUALITY OFSOME OF THESE SHOE MODELS IS IN DECLINE. THAT IS REALLY A SHAME.....THEIR QUALITY USEDTO BE THE BEST BUT-APPARENTLY- NO MORE. THIS HANNEL SANDAL IS ONE OF THEM.....LOW QUALITY.
customer_reviews.author: margaret388

customer_reviews.title: Always Love Mephistos
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing these all summer. These are the only brand of shoes I trust.
customer_reviews.author: Lindaartist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto sandals give me the support I need, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: A Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Liked them, but the style didn't work.  Had to return them..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my mother because she has wide feet and I thought the straps would work for her. The style and footbed is great. Unfortunately, it isn't a good style for someone with a very high instep or may be experiencing some swollen feet. The top strap just didn't work. I have had a pair of these for some years and I love them. Actually, they are almost worn out.
customer_reviews.author: June P. La Rue

customer_reviews.title: Should try on shoes first before buying.
customer_reviews.text: Had another pair exactly the same style but these did not fit the same.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Lea

customer_reviews.title: always love the support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th or 5th pair of Hannels, always love the support and comfort. My only problem is having to punch additional holes in the straps to make them narrow enough as they get broken in.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Liebler

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Suzie-q

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it as it didn't fit my feet properly
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Becker

customer_reviews.title: mephisto sandal
customer_reviews.text: These sandals were just a reorder of shoes that I have worn for 2 summers and were showing signs of wear. Very comfortable and look nice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Manhattan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a great replacement for Birks. The support is great as always with Mephisto and it's slightly more feminine than Birks.
customer_reviews.author: FL Shopper

customer_reviews.title: For some reason the sizing was off. It wasn't ...
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the sizing was off. It wasn't a size 7. :( I didn't have a chance to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Lil D

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally comfortable! Love them
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally comfortable! Love them. I'm sure I will wear them out over the years as I did my last pair of Mephistos.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Women's Hannel Sandel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Mephisto Women's Hannel Sandal as a gift for my sister who lives in another state. The photo for the black model on line is clearly black nubuck, which is what my sister wanted. Instead she was sent black patent leather. She did not want the inconvenience of exchanging so she reluctantly kept them. I reported the problem to the vendor who denied that this was the color and type of leather represented in image. I just checked and black nubuck is the picture representing the black Hannel sandal. So the sandals are good supportive shoes but beware of this vendor in regards to specific details.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DON'T SELL SOMETHING YOU DON'T CARRY IN STOCK OR SEND SOMETHING DIFFERENT THAN WHAT'S ORDERED
customer_reviews.text: First off I ordered a size 9 US which is size 40 European , I was sent size 39 European which is size 7 1/2 to 8 US , when tried to exchange for another size 9 and text said size 9 was not in stock, was wondering if that was why they sent me the wrong size to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Arrived with in days of ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Don't choose Black Nubuck
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto makes very comfy sandals, but don't order the black nubuck. The dye bleeds all over your feet! Nothing like slipping off your sandals and having your feet look like they are filthy because there is black dye all over them!
customer_reviews.author: Shaq

customer_reviews.title: Supportive shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Great support for flat feet. Sole softer compared to Birkenstocks. Would highly recommend for stability and arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M. Sicard

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals for narrow feet with high arches! I can wear these for long periods of time with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit, colour and quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was exactly what I expected. Excellent fit, colour and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistently a great company.
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is extremely comfortable and the quality if excellent. I have a multitude of foot problems and this shoe is one I can consistently count on to feel good all day long. I also have it other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: This was not a size 10. Order up by at least a size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am a perfect women's size 5
customer_reviews.text: Cute but way to large. I am a perfect women's size 5.
customer_reviews.author: Nunks

customer_reviews.title: Not my style
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to replace my worn Spring Step Tamryn sandals, they look similar, but when I got them they look liked they were men's sandals. They are wide and bulky. They were comfortable but I didn't like how they looked on. I sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma A

product_meta.title: Mephisto Women's Hannel Sandals
product_meta.description:
Flat sandal with mephisto soft air technology

Style and comfort are every woman's priority. Mephisto's Hannel has you covered. This sandal features a strappy leather upper with adjustable buckled straps. Its contoured footbed and shock-absorbing sole make this shoe a treat for your feet.

Mephisto makes some of the finest walking shoes on earth. Their comfort, support and durability are recognized wherever people are serious about walking. For more than three decades, Mephisto has been on the forefront of walking-shoe innovation. Mephisto’s natural products are handmade of leather, latex, cork and rubber.

See more
feature_bullets: Slide sandal with buckled straps featuring cork midsole and contoured footbed
